content.question: For 0<t<60, must there be a time t when v(t)=-5? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: For 0<t<60, must there be a time t when v(t)=-5? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 1.16: Working with the Intermediate Value Theorem (IVT)
